sections.text: Make the intention for Ablution, and say Bismillah. Mohammed is His messenger and say: O Allah! Place me among the repentant and make me one of those who are purified
Wash the hands up to the wrist three times starting with the right hand. Interlace your fingers to allow the water to penetrate between them.
With the right hand, rinse the mouth out with water three times.
Take the water with your right hand, sniff it into your nose, and release it out three times.
Wash your face three times, making sure that water reaches all parts of your face.
Wash the right hand up to the elbow three times, then the left hand three times.
Wipe the head from the hairline to the back one time.
Rub your ears inside and outside with your thumbs one time.
Wash the two feet up to the ankles beginning with the right foot, allowing water to penetrate among the toesâ€”three times.
